name: Ceremony of Aeon's Guidance
summary: Your patron aeon has allowed you to call upon their gifts to serve their ends.
description:
Your patron aeon has allowed you to call upon their gifts to serve their ends. You can cast augury and calm emotions each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Conrasu: A people that are made of cosmic force given consciousness and housed within unique exoskeletons. Conrasus craft and use these weapons.
